thread.title: RxS LLC Launches Full DirectID Integration with MedPro Systems
thread.title_full: RxS LLC Launches Full DirectID Integration with MedPro Systems

author: admin
title: RxS LLC Launches Full DirectID Integration with MedPro Systems
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/24/2015 @ 10:54 AM   RxS LLC 
MANALAPAN, N.J., Sept. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- RxS LLC, a leading provider of Sample Management and Multi-Channel Marketing Solutions, is pleased to announce its integration with MedPro Systems via the new MedPro DirectID - RxS solution . This new solution enables RxS' proprietary Pharmaceutical Sample Management and Compliance suite of products immediate & secure access to the industry leading 15 million record MedProID Healthcare Professional (HCP) database for the most up to date practitioner licensure information available today. 
MedPro Systems, through its expanding DirectID web services integrations, enables real-time access to the latest healthcare practitioner information directly within Life Science vendor applications. MedPro's DirectID API has been embedded within RxS' two flagship products: LinkedRx and TeleTargetRx . -- LinkedRx - The most technically advanced Multi-Channel Sample Management solution on the market. -- The MedPro DirectID - RxS integration now enables RxS' clients and internal support staff the ability to manage practitioner level data on demand throughout the compliance lifecycle for their Direct to Practitioner and Sales Representative Hand Carry Sample Accountability programs. -- TeleTargetRx - Pharmaceutical specific relationship management Telemarketing Call Center platform. -- Client supported tele-center agents can now pre-validate practitioners during outbound and inbound calls. Call Center agents can also seamlessly add practitioners into the customer universe with the latest HCP data, meeting customer-specific sampling restrictions, addressing off-label promotional concerns and capturing all Sunshine Act Reporting data elements. 
"We see great value in extending our internal workflows to include a direct connection to MedPro's 15 million record HCP database", says Mark Jara, Principal at RxS LLC. Sensitive direct-to-practitioner sample orders are now validated in real-time during data entry; representatives sample analysts can also review and revalidate HCP's "on demand" within the same system. 
"During early technical discussions between the RxS and MedPro teams for the LinkedRx integration, RxS immediately saw the value of embedding the feature into the TeleTargetRx application as well", says Bryan Andrews, Director - Sales Operations of MedPro Systems. "Our MedPro DirectID integration into TeleTargetRx allows telemarketing agents additional on demand features such as confirming HCP specialties prior to calls, which saves time, but more importantly facilitates a more detailed tailored conversation with the HCP." 
For more information on the new MedPro DirectID - RxS solution, please contact RxS or MedPro Systems. https://www.medproid.com/Public/Solutions/DirectIDRxS 
About RxS LLC® RxS removes the complexity and the administrative burden of managing multichannel sampling activities for its Pharmaceutical and Biotech clients through its state of art Sample Management/Accountability services driven by technology and supported by deep and extensive industry expertise, while delivering superior customer service. Where Field Representative Sample Accountability leaves off, RxS continues with PDMA compliance and Sample Management for all channels. 
For more information, please visit: www.rxsinfo.com 
About MedPro Systems® MedPro Systems is the leading provider of healthcare license solutions to the Life Science industry. Since 2001, the MedProID® suite of products has assisted pharmaceutical & device manufacturers, distributors and other healthcare organizations with practitioner & organization state license validation solutions to meet Prescription Drug Marketing Act (PDMA), DQSA/DSCSA & Aggregate Spend compliance requirements. MedPro's solutions are used by over 335 Life Science customers, including 21 of the Top 25 pharmaceutical manufacturers. For more information, please visit: www.medprosystems.com 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/rxs-llc-launches-full-directid-integration-with-medpro-systems-300148729.html 
SOURCE RxS LLC
